statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); git_branch=$(cd "$current_dir" 2>/dev/null && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo ''); if [ -n "$git_branch" ]; then printf '\033[01;32m%s@%s\033[00m:\033[01;34m%s\033[00m \033[01;35m(%s)\033[00m [%s]' "$(whoami)" "$(hostname -s)" "$(basename "$current_dir")" "$git_branch" "$model"; else printf '\033[01;32m%s@%s\033[00m:\033[01;34m%s\033[00m [%s]' "$(whoami)" "$(hostname -s)" "$(basename "$current_dir")" "$model"; fi
